full_text: TITLE: Treatment and Outcomes of Patients With Ischemic Stroke During COVID-19 ABSTRACT: Supplemental Digital Content is available in the text. BODY: Methods:Get With The Guidelines-Stroke is a national registry of adults with stroke in the United States. Using this registry, we identified patients with a diagnosis of AIS before (n=39 113; November 1, 2019–February 3, 2020) and after (n=41 971; February 4, 2020–June 29, 2020) the first reported case of COVID-19 in the registry. Characteristics, treatment patterns, quality metrics, and in-hospital outcomes were compared between the 2 groups.
